column5: Our friend's parents have a cottage/ house just above the ferry at Glanora. I took some pictures in September. We won't be back until early December. They did their renovations in the fall  Ferries crossing at dusk   Ferry crossing back. It's the place at the top.     BTW, there is a lake up there.
WOW great view thats for sure !!!! its sure a nice place down there lots of friendly people,and great scenery,and well the fishing....AMAZING !!!!! cheers
Great pictures kickingfrog !!  Sure wish I had a dollar for everytime I've crossed on that ferry over the years.  Here's a look at the Adolphustown side from 45-50 years ago...dirt roads & all

Wow, cool picture Lew, is that your car  Nice place up there.  Maybe they can have us all for next year's G2G, it looks big enough  I didn't know there was a lake up there too, that's cool.  What kind of fish are in it?  Joey
Lake for sure Joey...you not notice the waterfall comin out of it (Lake of the Mountain I believe)
